The dataset was generated from original data at http://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/Human+Activity+Recognition+Using+Smartphones 

A single script is included that performs all analytic steps.

--------------------
run_analysis.R
--------------------

This test and training data was combined into a single dataset, and reshaped to show the MEAN of each measurement dealing with mean or standard deviation within each subject for each activity.
